snippet: The Washington Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin was named a first-team N.H.L. All-Star at right wing and a second-team All-Star at left wing.
abstract: Washington Capitals star player Alex Ovechkin is named a first-team NHL All-Star at right wing and a second-team All-Star at left wing; other NHL developments noted.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin was named a first-team N.H.L. All-Star at right wing and a second-team All-Star at left wing.

headline.main: Ovechkin Is Named an All-Star at Two Positions
headline.print_headline: Ovechkin Is All-Star at Two Positions
